review: I didn't plan on getting one.  I figured I didn't need it.  I watch Netflix and HBOgo on my laptop.  Then, I got one for my birthday and I quickly went into a tv/movie coma for a few days!  The picture is crystal clear.  It's easy to use.  Awesome!
author: CC

review: 1st unit wouldn't stay connected to our wifi - had a new one sent and the second one wouldn't stay connected either ... Called for support and they were really nice but ultimately not helpful. Calling today to get a shipping label sent so we can have it sent back and get a credit hopefully. Maybe it was just us ( though I can't imagine how since we have other stuff - smart TV, phones and Tablet on our network ) but personally I wouldn't buy it.
author: Tom

review: Netflix app keeps freezing up. As does the Watch ESPN app. I watch streams on these apps on other devices in my home with no issue, so I'm confident it's not a Wi-Fi issue.
author: Jeremy E Redding

review: Whole family is loving this!! I will be purchasing another soon for basement TV. Great product. Replaced the Roku 2. FireTV stick outperforms the roku by far. No problems. Intuitive and simple enough for all family members to easily navigate. Thanks for this wonderful product!!!!
author: kjshopper "kgirlshopper"

review: I like the operating system but the remote was glitchy and sometimes missed button presses. Replaced with the Fire TV box and am really happy.
